TEXT.TITLE: GAMING AND TECHNOLOGY <GATI.O> PRESIDENT RESIGN
TEXT.BODY: Gaming and Technology Inc said Stan Fulton has resigned as president of the company. Chairman Alfred Wilms said he will assume the additional position of president. Fulton will remain a director of the company and will work on special projects, a Gaming and Technology spokeswoman said. Reuter
